11858.quoteText:
If you do nothing during your visit but browse through the Website, read pages, or download information, JAN gathers and stores certain information about your visit automatically.
This information does not identify you personally.
11858.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

tosdr.case: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

11859.quoteText: JAN automatically collects and stores only the following information about your visit:
11859.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

11860.quoteText: and IP address (an IP address is a number that is automatically assigned to your computer whenever you are surfing the Web) from which you access our Web site;
11860.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

tosdr.case: This service collects your IP address for location use

11861.quoteText: JAN uses this information to help make the site more useful to visitors and to learn about the number of visitors to our site.
11861.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

11862.quoteText: We do not give information to any other organization or company.
11862.title: The service does not share user information with third parties

tosdr.case: The service does not share user information with third parties

11863.quoteText: Please note that our Website has links to a variety of Websites, which may have other privacy policies.
11863.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

11864.quoteText: JAN does not track or record information about individuals and their visits.
11864.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you

11865.quoteText: Links from the Job Accommodation Network (JAN) Website to other sites do not constitute an endorsement from JAN. These links are provided as an information service only. It is up to the web surfer to evaluate the content and usefulness of information obtained from other sites.
11865.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

tosdr.case: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
